name: Intune Reporting
description: Entra ID Groups Inspector is a Log Analytics dashboard that tracks changes to Azure Entra (Azure AD) groups, including creations, deletions, and membership edits. It surfaces audit-log data with built-in visuals, time filters, and export options for security and compliance workflows. Designed for Intune and Entra ID environments, it helps admins quickly validate group governance and access changes.
author: Damien VAN ROBAEYS

securityCheck.aiSummary: The Intune Reporting suite primarily performs legitimate Graph / Intune operations but contains hardcoded secrets in multiple scripts, broad Graph permissions, and telemetry-like data collection. Key mitigations: remove hardcoded secrets by using Azure Key Vault or automation credentials, apply least-privilege permissions for App Roles, clearly authorize and document telemetry endpoints and data scopes, and ensure mandatory configuration values are supplied and validated before deployment.
